note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Image-extrator
tagline: This is a simple web application that is able to extract images from urls and caches them. It's using Reddit's code.
body:
### Image Extractor

This is a community web service: a "generic" building block for many webservices that you can deploy quickly on Google App Engine and benefit from some cloud magic.

```
$ curl http://image-extrator.appspot.com/?url=http://deals.woot.com/deals/details/a4044a89-8ac1-40b2-8a92-3c537277218e/paranormal-agency-appstore-for-android
> http://d3gqasl9vmjfd8.cloudfront.net/4ff65972-a11c-4e0c-9fa8-ad0e22dea172.jpg
```

## Check also
Other Community Web Services published by Superfeedr include: [Feediscovery](https://github.com/superfeedr/feediscovery) and [Notifixlight](https://github.com/superfeedr/notifixlight)
